授業目的: The purpose of this course is for students to improve their fluency skills.
到達目標: Students will be able to practice fluency strategies.
特記事項: この授業を履修するには、事前にレベル認定の申請が必要です。詳細は備考欄を確認してください。
授業の概要・背景: Each class, students will look at some examples of spoken English that have a feature of interest and discuss the examples. Then students will discuss a topic from the topic list. The teacher will take notes on the conversations and give feedback and initiate discussion.

Introduction
Overview
